content: We generated net income of $22.3 million and EPS of $0.88 per diluted share, both representing over 300% improvement versus the prior year's first quarter. In the first quarter of our fiscal year 2022, we reported improved sales of $229.8 million, 7.8% higher than the prior year first quarter where we had sales of $213.3 million. Our Metal Coatings segment generated first quarter sales of $127.7 million, a 7.3% increase over the $119 million reported in the first quarter of last year. Metal Coatings operating margins were 24.7%, 360 basis points improved over fiscal '21 first quarter and 60 basis points improved over the first quarter of fiscal year 2020.
